Elections

This page contains information that pertains to elections and candidate eligibility processes. Should you have any questions, please contact the City of Abernathy at (806) 298-2546.

[![Hale County Seal](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Hale-County-seal-150x150.png)](https://www.halecounty.org/county_offices/election_information.php)

[Visit Hale County](https://www.halecounty.org/county_offices/election_information.php "Visit Hale County's Election Office")

[![Lubbock County Seal](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Lubbock-County-Seal-150x150.jpg)](https://www.votelubbock.org/)

[Visit Lubbock County](https://www.votelubbock.org/ "Visit Lubbock County's Election Office")

[![Seal of the Texas Secretary of State](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Texas-Secretary-of-State-150x150.png)](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/index.shtml)

[Visit Secretary of State](https://www.sos.state.tx.us/elections/index.shtml "Visit the Secretary of State's Website")

[![Seal of the State of Texas](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Seal-of-Texas-150x150.jpg)](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/)

On November 5, 1991, Texas voters approved an amendment that added a new provision, Article III, Section 24a, to the Texas Constitution. The constitutional amendment created the Texas Ethics Commission.

[Visit Texas Ethics Commission](https://www.ethics.state.tx.us/ "Visit the State of Texas Ethics Commission")

  The Abernathy City Council hereby cancels the election scheduled to be helped on May 6, 2023 in accordance with Section 2.053(a) of the Texas Election Code. The following candidates have

* #### [Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot for the 2023 Election](https://cityofabernathy.org/city-news/notices/elections/2022/12/notice-of-deadline-to-file-an-application-for-place-on-the-ballot/)

  [![Notice of Deadline to File an Application for Place on the Ballot for the 2023 Election](https://cityofabernathy.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Abernathy-City-News-150x150.jpg)](https://cityofabernathy.org/city-news/notices/elections/2022/12/notice-of-deadline-to-file-an-application-for-place-on-the-ballot/)

  Notice is hereby given that an application for a place on the City of Abernathy Regular Election ballot may be filed during the following time: 1/18/2023 to 2/17/2023. Filing Dates
